page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF IAN
page.content: Ian is married with two sons. Wakes at 5 a.m.Listens to news.Washes, dresses,prepares breakfast and his lunch.6 a.m. cycles to work at Coventry.Measures and checks gauges. 9 a.m. breakfast-buttered buns,tea.Work until 12 noon-has work-out at weight lifting club.Has lunch,then work until 4 p.m.Cycles home,arrives 4.45 p.m.Showers and puts on clean clothes.Has cup of tea and chocolate biscuit.Plays cricket with son,Steven.6 p.m. cooks dinner prepared earlier by wife(before she went to work).Took Steven to Cubs,did washing up,worked on jigsaw,recorded Dallas(T.V.programme),played cricket with other son,Richard.Got the boys ready for bed,made supper at 9 p.m. when wife returned from work.Put boys to bed.Discussed holiday arrangements. Watched T.V.and video.Bed at midnight.
